reviews.review_msg: Dana is one of the best profs I've had at SFU. She's fair and I can tell she cares about her students. I didn't have any problem understanding the material/lectures, very straightforward. She discussed a lot about grad school for clinical psyc and tips which is very helpful and not many profs do that. Feedback/questions were encouraged

391 with dana was one of the easiest UD psyc courses I've taken. Lectures are kind of boring but the assignments are super easy! only 3 exams non cumulative and no final! She emphasizes the textbook for the exams, but I didn't read a single page and got above average. dana and raj are both super nice. Highly recommend!!

Dana wasn't that nice compared to Raj (TA) like when you approach her to ask questions she gave off a degrading attitude. She also just reads off her notes for 3 hours. Every week you're expected to submit a freewrite of minimum 150 words for participation, but she allows 4 skips which is pretty lenient.
